title: The Lonely Whelk
description: Things are changing rapidly in Pomegranate City as the government deals with the challenges the Bridge Door has brought to their society. Kaia, the new Globe intern, is thrown into a chaotic situation which requires calm, patience, and math to resolve. Meanwhile, the crew of a spaceship that left the planet centuries ago traveling near the speed of light has discovered an unfortunate surprise that could jeopardize their entire mission. This fast paced, quirky science fiction story will pull readers from beginning to end faster than you can say, “3… 2… 1… liftoff!”
author: Ariele Sieling
